front.title: Federal cybersecurity role-based training approaches, successes, and challenges

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This Special Publication details our research exploring cybersecurity role-based training for those who for individuals who are assigned management, operational, and technical roles having security and privacy responsibilities.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
